posts.post_title: FS 9 Different Obaks all of Oakland players
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following 9 Obaks for sale. All are of Oakland players.

Pfyl, Flatter, Coy, Hetling, Pearce, Maggert, Zacher, Wares, & Knight.

Price: $18.50 each. Your choice.
Shipping: $2.32

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card(s).


Thanks for looking,

Joe
